content: 100% acrylic yarn tapestry needle safety eyes/black yarn/beads stuffing stitch marker the shrimp is crocheted in one piece skill level is intermediate stitches in this pattern single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain magic_ring magic_ring in front/back loop any weight of yarn is also usable for the desired size but it s recommended to go down a hook size from the one recommended
